Class DecorItem

java.lang.Object
classes.DecorItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
PineappleHouse, Sandcastle, TreasureChest
public class DecorItem extends Object implements Item
Decor Item parent object.

The Decor item class provides a general format for each of the decor item subclasses (PineappleHouse, TreasureChest and Sandcastle). It has variables price, owned and equipped which are useful to all subclasses.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cadence Megan McGillicuddy

    • DecorItem

      public DecorItem(boolean owned, boolean equipped, int price)
      Decor item constructor. Creates a new Decor item.
      Parameters:
      owned - boolean indicating whether the decor item is owned or not
      equipped - boolean indicating whether the decor item is equipped or not
      price - the price of the decor item

    • isOwned

      public boolean isOwned()
      Retrieves whether the player already owns the decor item or not
      Returns:
      boolean true if the decor item has already been purchased by the player, false otherwise
